column2: INQUIRY PROFESSIONAL PRACTICE IN HEALTH/PHYSICAL EDUCATION
column6: Seminar focused on development of those skills and knowledge which enable future teachers to engage in effective reflective/collaborative/ethical professional practice. Final semester of four. Utilization of teaching learning tech.

column2: STUDENT TEACHING IN HEALTH AND PHYSICAL EDUCATION
column6: Full time student teaching which includes a balanced experience in elementary and secondary health and physical education.
